channel.title: Membership
channel.description: I had bought membership once on my account and basically the whole month i trained summoning and kill green dragons -.- i didnt really know what to do since it was my first time and now i might be buying membership agian in a day or two. I would like to know what are some intersteing things you can do as a member?

item.title: Membership
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:26, topic:422283”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=524954.msg3830432#msg3830432 date=1322524886]

Is that 62k coins or 62k yew logs? I also don’t see the need to sell them because what the hell am I going to spend the money on. I’d rather use the supplies for further skilling (Fletching etc.).

62k yew logs, saved every log so far.
[/quote]
Purely legit?[/quote]
Yes, I’m a pure skiller so I’m saving them for fletching. Will be doing a lot of flax spinning too soon because I want to make 100k yew long bows. So once I get 100k yews ill start fletching them.

Read full topic

item.title: Membership
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Farming is not relaxing, its a bunch of hard freaking work. I mean tilling a field can take hours of slow plowing, Then planting each seed 1 bye 1. That’s why live stock is more fun you can just let them do there own thing.

Although you guys mean on runescape.

Read full topic

or just use the logs themselves on fletching? and use the spares on firemaking?

item.title: Membership
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:19, topic:422283”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=524954.msg3829890#msg3829890 date=1322490737]

Best thing about membership in my opinion is farming, so relaxing.

Just a polite question…

ARE YOU INSANE?!?!? farming drains the will too live.

Not when you are a level 3, I don’t like combat so I farm (currently 93) and cut yews (currently 98). (: I love growing herbs and having them stack up in my bank.
[/quote]
Me too! I currently have 2,300 yew logs (they are dropping fast each day). Level 3.[/quote]
I have 62k. (: Also around 7k rannars and 89k lobster, 7k shark. I don’t have a need for money so I just sell stuff and buy trimmed armor sets that I can’t wear.

Read full topic

item.title: Membership
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

I camp at godwars as a member, I’m 129 combta and have overloads & turmoil, On an average day i can make about 10m profit in about 5 hours. Dependsing on weather i solo or team and other variables depending on lagg, crashers and what boss.

Read full topic

ye also the mini games are way better, and the quests
[/quote]
staking is a good fun thing in mem worlds ppl will stake x2 your ammount of cash… just no arm them i staked 500m and got 1.5b but that was on a friends account and i have to share with him :([/quote]i call bs no one stakes 2x higher unless there like 20 levels above you

Read full topic

item.title: Membership
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Imo, the best thing about p2p is Bossing. I’m too low of a level to kill any bosses besides KBD, but I had a 133 account for about a week and it was quite fun doing god wars and such. PKing is ALOT better too if you’re a main.

Read full topic
